title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Meet the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle—your new everyday MVP for sports, travel, and everything in between. In the vibrant Dreamy Field design, this 32oz bottle keeps your water icy-cold for up to 24 hours thanks to double-wall insulation, so you stay refreshed from first sip to finish line.

Sip it your way with the ingenious FreeSip spout: use the built-in straw for effortless sips or tip and swig from the wide opening when you’re on the move. The push-button lid pops open with one hand, then locks securely to prevent spills. A protective cover keeps the spout clean, and the carry loop doubles as a lock—smart, sturdy, and ready to go.

- 32oz capacity, stainless steel durability
- Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours
- FreeSip spout with built-in straw and swig opening
- Push-button lid with lock and protective cover
- Wide opening fits ice with ease
- BPA- and phthalate-free
- Lid is dishwasher-safe; bottle is hand wash
- Not for hot liquids
- Available in 24, 32, and 40 oz
- Backed by a limited lifetime warranty

From gym sessions to road trips, Owala FreeSip delivers clean, convenient hydration in a head-turning colorway. Grab Dreamy Field and make every sip feel like a fresh start.
